meanings.definition: The act of not inflating something enough.
meanings.sent1: The underinflations of the balloons made them sag.
meanings.sent2: The underinflations of the tires caused them to wear out faster.
meanings.sent3: The underinflations of the beach balls made them flop around comically.
meanings.sent4: The underinflations of the life jackets left the swimmers feeling unsupported.
meanings.sent5: The underinflations of the soccer balls made them bounce unpredictably.

meanings.definition: The state of being insufficiently inflated.
meanings.sent1: The underinflations of the basketballs affected their performance on the court.
meanings.sent2: The underinflations of the air mattresses made them uncomfortable to sleep on.
meanings.sent3: The underinflations of the party balloons caused them to droop sadly.
meanings.sent4: The underinflations of the balloons made them resemble deflated clouds.
meanings.sent5: The underinflations of the tires led to a bumpy ride on the bicycle.
